author: protolambda
content: Moving some validator keys around on the multi-client attacknet, and re-syncing lighthouse nodes for the new update. You may see some temporary instability.

author: protolambda
content:
Update:
- Expect longer instabity for a while. Planned move of keystores to prysm while updating lighthouse was not effective; prysm peers had problems restarting into a chain without finalizing peers.
- Teku is temporarily down as well. Took the keys out for a full redeploy of keys, but having problems with restarting nodes, investigating the issue there.
- Resyncing lighthouse (they changed db schema), which should then help the chain get back online.

author: protolambda
content: Update: net is restored to some extent. Teku maintaining the chain, lighthouse syncing. Will soon add back prysm, and then everything is up to date.
